MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY15 postcode area of Cupar. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:58pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a broken insulator on our overhead line network at Evenwood Farm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:52pm on Monday, 8th March 2021.
